name: 约书亚·惠查德
name_full: 约书亚·惠查德 Joshua Whichard
introduction: Joshua Whichard is an American actor. He began his career with supporting/lead roles in shorts films while he was in film school leading to guest starring and smaller roles in The Outsider(2020), The Resident(2021), and Queens(2021). He has since had roles on Devotion(2022) and starred as Paul Murdaugh in The Murdaugh Murders(2023). He has had the privilege of working with actors such as, Jason Bateman, Glen Powell, Ben Mendlesohn, and Johnathan Majors among others.
